txt.en: You have turned in a stack of trophies for a modest reward suitable for a collector such as yourself.
Needed: Tough sword sheaths from the Orcs plaguing Meluinen. Deliver the items to Thaliollang at Lin Giliath.
'It is good to see that you are willing to stand against the Orcs. We are grateful for your assistance.'
'The Orcs infesting the area of Meluinen must be driven back, can you prove to us that you are assisting in these efforts.'
Elves of Rivendell Task: Tough Sword Sheaths
Thaliollang in the Elf-ruin of Meluinen at Lin Giliath requires the return of tough sword sheaths.
Deliver the tough sword sheaths to Thaliollang at Lin Giliath
You are on a task to collect Tough Sword Sheaths from Orcs plaguing Meluinen and to deliver them to Thaliollang. Thaliollang can be found at Lin Giliath, the Elf-ruins of Meluinen.
Needed: Tough sword sheaths from the Orcs plaguing Meluinen.
